allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add GeminiGen Brain - AI-powered 5-step storyboard pipeline

Added brain selection system with two processing modes:
- Storyboard Brain (existing fast logic)
- GeminiGen Brain (new AI-powered pipeline)

Pipeline steps:
1. Character Identification - Extract all characters with 20+ attributes
2. Environment Identification - Extract all environments with detailed descriptions
3. Script to Paragraph Splitting - AI-driven paragraph generation
4. Paragraph to Scene Generation - Create cinematic scenes per paragraph
5. Scene to Frame Prompts - Generate start/end frame prompts

Features:
- Brain selection modal on Page 1
- Tag-based parsing for structured GeminiGen responses
- Webhook polling for async AI processing
- Credits tracking and breakdown display
- Page 2 displays extracted characters/environments
- State management for all pipeline data
- Progress callbacks for real-time updates

Files:
- Created: v2/geminigen-brain.js (complete pipeline implementation)
- Modified: v2/state-manager.js (new storage methods)
- Modified: v2/index.html (brain selection UI & integration)
- Modified: v2/page2.html (display extracted data & credits)
